title: "健康診断ダッシュボード"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: columns
    vertical_layout: fill
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r data, include=FALSE}
data <- read.csv("open_tggates_biochemistry.csv")
data$EXP_ID <- as.factor(data$EXP_ID)
Numeric.Variables = c("GLC.mg.dL.", "CRE.mg.dL.", "TG.mg.dL.")
```

Column {data-width=300}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Glucose
```{r}
ggplot(data = data, aes(x=data$GLC.mg.dL.))+
  geom_histogram()
```

Column {data-width=300}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Cre

```{r}
ggplot(data = data, aes(x=data$CRE.mg.dL.))+
  geom_histogram()
```

### TG

```{r}
ggplot(data = data, aes(x=data$TG.mg.dL.))+
  geom_histogram()
```
